official_title: A bill to amend section 456 of title 28, United States Code, to allow actual travel expenses of justices and judges.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to require the Director of the Administrative Office of the United States Courts to pay all actual travel expenses for justices and judges.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 456 of title 28, United States Code, to allow actual travel expenses of justices and judges.
